original_text: When the territory of the people of Dan was lost to them, the people of Dan went up and fought against Leshem, and after capturing it and striking it with the sword they took possession of it and settled in it, calling Leshem, Dan, after the name of Dan their ancestor.
korean_text: 그런데 단 자손의 경계는 더욱 확장되었으니 이는 단 자손이 올라가서 레셈과 싸워 그것을 점령하여 칼날로 치고 그것을 차지하여 거기 거주하였음이라 그들의 조상 단의 이름을 따라서 레셈을 단이라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: When the territory of the people of Dan was lost to them
sentences.korean_translation: 단 지파의 영토가 그들에게서 잃혔을 때

sentences.original_text: the people of Dan went up
and striking it with the sword
after the name of Dan their ancestor
